metadata.title: CVE-2018-7643 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The display_debug_ranges function in dwarf.c in GNU Binutils 2.30 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (integer overflow andapplication crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a craftedELF file, as demonstrated by objdump.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
